results.title: Differential changes in the pharmacokinetics of statins in collagen-induced arthritis rats.
results.text_hl: The metabolic clearance of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and hepatic uptake clearance of @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ were decreased in @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001169 @@@CIA@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Lin CH, Hsu KW, Chen CH, Uang YS, Lin CJ. Differential changes in the pharmacokinetics of statins in collagen-induced arthritis rats. Biochem Pharmacol. 2017 Oct 15;142():216-228. PMID: 28636885
citations.BibTeX: @article{28636885, title={Differential changes in the pharmacokinetics of statins in collagen-induced arthritis rats.}, author={Lin CH and Hsu KW and Chen CH and Uang YS and Lin CJ}, journal={Biochem Pharmacol}, volume={142}, pages={216-228}}

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits cytokine-stimulated Cyr61 expression in osteoblastic cells: a therapeutic benefit for arthritis.
results.text_hl: Intraarticular injection of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibited @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001169 @@@CIA@@@ progression and diminished the number of @GENE_CCN1 @GENE_3491 @@@Cyr61@@@+ osteoblasts and infiltrating macrophages.

citations.NLM: Kok SH, Hou KL, Hong CY, Wang JS, Liang PC, Chang CC, Hsiao M, Yang H, Lai EH, Lin SK. Simvastatin inhibits cytokine-stimulated Cyr61 expression in osteoblastic cells: a therapeutic benefit for arthritis. Arthritis Rheum. 2011 Apr;63(4):1010-20. PMID: 20191585
citations.BibTeX: @article{20191585, title={Simvastatin inhibits cytokine-stimulated Cyr61 expression in osteoblastic cells: a therapeutic benefit for arthritis.}, author={Kok SH and Hou KL and Hong CY and Wang JS and Liang PC and Chang CC and Hsiao M and Yang H and Lai EH and Lin SK}, journal={Arthritis Rheum}, volume={63}, number={4}, pages={1010-20}}

results.title: Accelerated transformation of macrophage-derived foam cells in the presence of collagen-induced arthritis mice serum is associated with dyslipidemia.
results.text_hl: However, administering @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001169 @@@CIA@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ could lower high-density lipoprotein-cholesterol (HDL-C) level and elevate oxidized low-density lipoprotein (ox-LDL) level in @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001169 @@@CIA@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ serum, with attendant decreased @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ accumulation as well as CD36 expression in @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ macrophages.

citations.NLM: Wen W, He M, Liang X, Gao SS, Zhou J, Yuan ZY. Accelerated transformation of macrophage-derived foam cells in the presence of collagen-induced arthritis mice serum is associated with dyslipidemia. Autoimmunity. 2016;49(2):115-23. PMID: 26955845
citations.BibTeX: @article{26955845, title={Accelerated transformation of macrophage-derived foam cells in the presence of collagen-induced arthritis mice serum is associated with dyslipidemia.}, author={Wen W and He M and Liang X and Gao SS and Zhou J and Yuan ZY}, journal={Autoimmunity}, volume={49}, number={2}, pages={115-23}}

results.title: Endothelial dysfunction in rheumatoid arthritis: the role of monocyte chemotactic protein-1-induced protein.
results.text_hl: Small interfering RNA knockdown of @GENE_ZC3H12A @GENE_230738 @@@MCPIP@@@ restored the endothelial NO synthase-derived NO bioavailability. Administering @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis_Experimental</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001169 @@@CIA@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ ameliorated the @DISEASE_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D014652 @@@endothelial dysfunction@@@, with attendant decreased aortic level of @GENE_ZC3H12A @GENE_230738 @@@MCPIP@@@.

citations.NLM: He M, Liang X, He L, Wen W, Zhao S, Wen L, Liu Y, Shyy JY, Yuan Z. Endothelial dysfunction in rheumatoid arthritis: the role of monocyte chemotactic protein-1-induced protein. Arterioscler Thromb Vasc Biol. 2013 Jun;33(6):1384-91. PMID: 23580143
citations.BibTeX: @article{23580143, title={Endothelial dysfunction in rheumatoid arthritis: the role of monocyte chemotactic protein-1-induced protein.}, author={He M and Liang X and He L and Wen W and Zhao S and Wen L and Liu Y and Shyy JY and Yuan Z}, journal={Arterioscler Thromb Vasc Biol}, volume={33}, number={6}, pages={1384-91}}
